World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 13 日星期三 18:11:00 GMT 120
EU agrees 5 bln euro boost for Ukraine military aid fundEuropean Union countries agreed on Wednesday to provide 5 billion euros for military aid for Ukraine as part of a revamp of an EU-run assistance fund, handing Kyiv a timely boost as its forces struggle against Russia's invasion. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:21:08 GMT MQAADROFOJKVTBBTYEFCVQ4E4A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-agrees-5-bln-euro-boost-ukraine-military-aid-fund-2024-03-13/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
IMF intends to pick next managing director by end-April, board saysThe International Monetary Fund has begun the process of selecting its next managing director and intends to choose a candidate by the end of April, the global lender's executive board said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:10:31 GMT PU4EJFUQQZNQPF6TBGZCMZXVOY https://www.reuters.com/world/imf-intends-pick-next-managing-director-by-end-april-board-says-2024-03-13/Reuters世界
Argentina's FX reserves buys hits $10 bln under MileiArgentina's central bank purchases of foreign currency since libertarian President Javier Milei took office in December are set to top $10 billion on Wednesday, Reuters calculations show, as the government looks to erase a deep net reserves deficit. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 16:42:43 GMT LVCEB5GJIJL3TMSG4WXMBSOHSQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/argentinas-fx-reserves-buys-hits-10-bln-under-milei-2024-03-13/Jorge Otaola, Walter Bianchi市场
Spain's Catalonia calls early election on eve of amnesty voteCatalonia will hold an early election on May 12 after the separatist minority government of the Spanish region failed to approve its budget proposal in the regional parliament, Catalan government head Pere Aragones said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 16:28:58 GMT V3CIJ7JDSBPLVEQX5F44P2XJSI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spains-catalonia-calls-snap-election-regional-budget-rejected-2024-03-13/Joan Faus世界欧洲
Restaurant operator Alsea to boost investments 27% in 2024Mexico's Alsea, which operates chains such as Domino's Pizza and Starbucks, plans to invest six billion pesos ($358.85 million) into the business this year, up 27% from 2023 spending, the firm's chief financial officer said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 16:19:21 GMT 2ZWI5C3Q3VOJLH7HL2KH5HYFWE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/restaurant-operator-alsea-plans-top-5000-stores-this-year-2024-03-13/Kylie Madry世界美洲
Excerpts of U.N. report into attack on reporters in LebanonAn Israeli tank killed Reuters reporter Issam Abdallah in Lebanon last year by firing two 120 mm rounds at a group of "clearly identifiable journalists" in violation of international law, a U.N. investigation into the Oct. 13 incident has found. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 16:06:09 GMT第357章https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/excerpts-un-report-into-attack-reporters-lebanon-2024-03-13/Reuters世界中东
Sudanese seek connections through Starlink after weeks of blackoutsSome Sudanese residents cut off from mobile networks for weeks due to war between rival military factions are using Starlink satellite connections to access the internet, as regular coverage started to return to other parts of the country. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 15:58:45 GMT SGHSMBZG4ZMBZKN4XEXKMLZU74 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudanese-seek-connections-through-starlink-after-weeks-blackouts-2024-03-13/El Tayeb Siddig世界非洲
Exclusive: Israeli tank strike killed 'clearly identifiable' Reuters reporter - UN reportAn Israeli tank killed Reuters reporter Issam Abdallah in Lebanon last year by firing two 120 mm rounds at a group of "clearly identifiable journalists" in violation of international law, a U.N. investigation into the Oct. 13 incident has found. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 15:51:04 GMT ANDOJQHH7BICLDD5OAFEISNONQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tank-strike-killed-clearly-identific-reuters-reporter-un-report-2024-03-13/David Gauthier-Villars, Laila Bassam, Tom Perry世界中东
More aid to be sent from Cyprus to Gaza as sea route gains acceptance, minister saysA second shipment of aid will be sent from Cyprus to Gaza in coming days, its foreign minister said on Wednesday, citing growing acceptance the island could play a pivotal role in delivering supplies by sea to the shattered Palestinian enclave. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 15:44:44 GMT VTBVAEBQ3VNF3GFWMF5D7XZARA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/more-aid-be-sent-cyprus-gaza-sea-route-gains-acceptance-minister-says-2024-03-13/Michele Kambas, Yiannis Kourtoglou世界中东
Texas man who lived seven decades in iron lung dies at age 78A paralyzed Texas man who lived 70 years inside an iron lung after he survived polio as a child has died, his family said. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 15:42:27 GMT GRISYU63RZLUNDTG2TGKNEJBBE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/texas-man-who-lived-seven-decades-iron-lung-dies-age-78-2024-03-13/Brendan O'Brien世界美国
Trump Georgia election subversion judge dismisses some chargesThe judge in Donald Trump's Georgia election subversion trial on Wednesday dismissed three criminal counts against the former U.S. president and three others against co-defendants, a court filing showed on Wednesday, while letting the overall case proceed. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 14:29:45 GMT 2IY4MZZMR5LMZENHRSP5F5FJ2Y https://www.reuters.com/legal/judge-dismisses-some-charges-georgia-indictment-against-trump-2024-03-13/Reuters合法的诉讼
